### Bet on Stamford this year!

We're going "all in" on celebrating Stamford this year! Join us for our Annual Best of Stamford event - Presented by the Stamford Chamber of Commerce. Our Chamber Members as well as our community are invited to join us
**Saturday, February 7, 2025**
at the
, just south of the TCR Rodeo Groups to have a fun-filled night to fundraise for our Chamber of Commerce and to celebrate some of our local “Bests” with an award ceremony.

This year's fundraising event will feature a professionally run casino night, from The E-Casino Events in Dallas, complete with craps, roulette, and black jack! Your pre-purchased tickets includes $1000 additional "play money" to spend at the tables and a
raffle ticket to enter into our drawings at the end of the evening.

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/0d948870-a043-45b0-beaf-1c754bf528ec/1.png)

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/afaaa6e7-3cb6-4496-b1c6-5fe6c1c53149/Best+of+Stamford)

We need your help! Please make your nominations
[here](https://forms.gle/DTYwFPAd9tTSzHS9A)
for the categories of Business of the Year and Citizen(s) of the Year. Nominations will close Sunday, January 4, 2026.

The top three nominations for each category will then be presented to our Chamber of Commerce members for a final vote. Award winners will be announced at the Best of Stamford event on Saturday, February 7, 202.

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/1740694026348-SJXM1FOZDQX5Z2XEG80A/unsplash-image-oT-XbATcoTQ.jpg)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/c9a97b6f-d10d-4a68-87e2-333ff9f8e73a/stamfordinsuranceagency)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/1bb9244d-4edf-4ddc-9f23-5a88a2ff7636/image.png)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/645a5c250f356c56f6bd856a/40a80cc2-15f7-43be-9148-d87be99f23e6/Capture.png)
